channel.title: Done in port forwarding, but still need help
channel.description:
im done in port forwarding ... the problem is how my friends play with me? howthey will play with me? what should they download ?
thank you ^^

item.title: Done in port forwarding, but still need help
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

This guide should help you https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html and is still pretty up to date for what you want.

Read full topic
item.source: Done in port forwarding, but still need help

item.title: Done in port forwarding, but still need help
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

heatrn11:

Add said IP adress and the open port to your client…Upload to a free hosting site and give your friends the download link.

make sure to configure the client with your Router’s ip address, (its value from the outside, not the default gateway)
try something like whatismyip.com, and while this is subject to change, it will give them the ability to connect.

Read full topic
item.source: Done in port forwarding, but still need help

item.title: Done in port forwarding, but still need help
item.dc:creator: @Rhobot Rhobot
item.description:
@Rhobot wrote:

give them your server (host) ip address and the port you forwarded to connect via your server’s client.
